verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing, sing, sing,
Sing of the joy of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Joy, joy, joy,
Talk of the joy of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Shine, shine, shine,
Show for the joy to the world.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sing of it, talk of it, shine and rejoice,
And live in the joy of the Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Cantad, cantad, cantad el gozo de Dios
Gozad, gozad, gozad, hablad del gozo de dios
Brillad, brillad, brillad, mostrad el gozo al mundo
Cantadlo, habladlo, brillad y gozad
Y vivid en el gozo de Dios.
